name: Go! Spies
description:
Masters Project

The worlds most dangerous criminals are on the loose, and Britain's 9th best secret agent... yes 9th... is on the case!

Fight criminal organisations as Agent Andy and his team of friends as you work to clear the world of evil. Complete daring missions and solve fun puzzles as you take your characters on exciting adventures.

In this vetical slice, you take Agent Andy on a mission to defeat a gang who have taken over the National Bank.

Portolio Link: https://jayjamiej.wixsite.com/home/gospies
